settings.question:
What will you be riding in?

settings.product_recommendations_heading: Get everything you need to start moving

settings.title: School year essentials
settings.text: Gear up for the school year. Commute to campus, cruise to class or take a much needed study break with expertly designed, durably crafted, accessibly priced gear. No frills or fuss, just fun.

settings.title: The Retrospec Pledge
settings.checklist:
Invite everyone, regardless of experience
Focus on having fun, not being first
Be nice. It's that simple.
Keep spirits high, even if energy is low
Leave judgment at the doorstep

settings.team_description: Since selling our first bike, we've designed hundreds of new products that get more people outside at an accessible price. When we're not geeking out on new designs for outside essentials, you can usually find us sporting Retrospec gear under the California sun.

settings.title:
Making nature 
second-nature
settings.text: The outside is for everyone, but not everyone feels comfortable outside. So we set out to make everyone feel at-home in the open-air. We believe that all people regardless of background or experience should enjoy the life-affirming, eye-opening beauty of the outside world.

settings.title: Adventure Labs, where we research, design and test our gear.
settings.text: This is where the magic happens. We pool all of our passion, expertise, and creatvity together to design best-in-class products that all but open your front door for you.

settings.title: Accessible prices and local sellers
settings.text:
We partner directly with manufacturers to sell top-tier gear at more accessible prices than traditional retailers. We also sell at local shops, so you can try our gear in-person. We deeply value our closely-knit network of local retailers and the added value their expertise and support provides to Restrospec customers. 

Whatever your needs, Retrospec is committed to providing you with ready-to-outdoor essentials you can count on for any adventure.

settings.header: All natural fun from the field

settings.title: About
settings.description_text: Retrospec has teamed up with Affirm to offer easy financing – without a catch. There are no gimmicks like deferred interest or hidden fees, so the total you see at checkout is always what you actually pay. Provide some basic information and get instant approval to split your purchase into 3, 6, or 12 monthly payments with rates from 10-30% APR. For example A loan of $500 from Affirm would look like this: $43.96/mo. based on a purchase price of $500.00 at 10% APR for 12 months.

settings.description_tab_1:
Does Affirm perform a credit check?

Affirm does a credit check to verify your identity and provide you with a financing offer when you sign up. This is a ‘soft’ credit check and will not impact your credit score. If you choose to complete a purchase and finance it with Affirm, we will do a single ‘hard’ credit check when your first order is processed by the merchant. This may have a minor impact on your credit score. For future purchases with Affirm we won’t need to check your credit again.

 

Why was I prompted to pay a down payment with a credit card?

We try hard to approve every purchase with Affirm but sometimes we can’t approve the full amount. When this happens, we provide a debit card down payment option so that you may still complete your purchase right away.

 

Why was I prompted for a checking account?

Affirm sometimes requires additional information to consider a credit application. Such information may include an active checking account, which helps us verify your identity and your ability to repay the requested loan. If we prompt you for this information but you are unable to provide it, Affirm will be unable to approve your credit application.

 

Can I see an example loan specifying terms of the loan?

Sure! A loan of $500 from Affirm would look like this: $43.96/mo. based on a purchase price of $500.00 at 10% APR for 12 months.

 

Legal Disclosure:

Subject to credit check and approval. Down payment may be required. For purchases under $100, limited payment options are available. Estimated payment amount excludes taxes and shipping fees. Affirm loans are made by Cross River Bank, a New Jersey State Chartered Commercial Bank, Member FDIC. See www.affirm.com/faqs for details.

settings.title: Retrospec is excited to introduce our Charter Rental Bike line:
settings.text:
An ideal choice for hotels, resorts, rental shops, beach towns, factories and industrial applications. We employed a step-thru aluminum frame to make getting on-and-off easy, and with multiple sizes and colors from which to choose, your fleet will have a bike for the whole family!

The Charter’s aluminum frame makes for a rental bike that is robust, resilient, and rust-resistant, also packed-full of hand picked and durable components, this bike is designed to rent over and over with very low maintenance. We also incorporated an extra-large welded metal plate which offers plenty of real estate for branding. The Charter’s handlebars and laid back geometry create an upright ride that's super comfortable! With it's comfort saddle, ergonomic comfort grips and aluminum pedals with slip-resistant Kraton rubber, you can expect comfort throughout even the longest of rides.

No detail was overlooked in the inception and construction of the Charter... and it shows. In addition to the aforementioned features, this premiere rental bike from Retrospec sports double-wall alloy rims, cartridge bottom bracket, sealed precision headset, stainless steel spokes, and a KMC Rust-Buster chain for ultimate reliability and rideability.

settings.title: 20" Single speed
settings.content: The 20" Charter is the perfect addition to your fleet that will accommodate the young ones in the family. It boast some impressive features including aluminum frame, quick-release seat post clamp, sign plate, rustbuster chain, 13g stainless steel spokes, ergo grips etc.. With this bike, the kiddos will be riding in style!
settings.specifications:
• Frame: Aluminum Low Step-Thru, Unisex
  • Brakes: Coaster Brakes
  • Tires: 20x2.125 Cruiser Tires
  • Fork: Steel 1" Threaded
  • Handlebar: Cruiser Bar, 22.2mm
  • Stem: Quill Stem
  • Headset: Sealed Mechanism
  • Saddle: Comfort Cruiser Saddle
  • Crank: Prowheel 3PC Alloy
  • Chainring: 40T Alloy
  • Rear Cog: 18T
  • Chain: KMC Rust-Buster
  • Bottom Bracket: Sealed Cartridge Bearing
  • Pedals: Wellgo Aluminum Chasis with Kraton Rubber
  • Rims: Aluminum Double-Wall with 13G Stainless Steel Spokes, Coated ED Black
  • Hub Rear: KT Coaster Brake Hub
  • Hub Front: KT Hub
  • Axle Nuts: Stainless Steel Acorn
  • Seat Post Clamp: 31.8mm, Black
  • Seatpost: 27.2mm, 300mm
  • Grips: Comfort Ergonomic
  • Kickstand: Rear Mount Bolted to Frame
  • Sign Plate: Welded Large Metal Plate with Removable Decal
  • Recommended Weight Limit: 220 LBS

settings.title: 24" Single Speed
settings.content: The 24" Charter is perfect for teens and petite adults alike. It also packs some impressive features including aluminum frame, quick-release seat post clamp, sign plate, rustbuster chain, 13g stainless steel spokes, ergo grips, rear mount kickstand, plus many more. Great addition to any fleet!

settings.title: Dealer Program and Custom Orders
settings.text:
At Retrospec, we strive to offer you the best product for the best price including price breaks and shipping specials to help you maximize your profits! If you are interested in getting a quote feel free to call us at 888-488-2369 or email one of our account executives at wholesasle@retrospecusa.com

We are also happy to customize your fleet order with branded colors, decals, and accessories for the Charter Rental Bike line as well as others, such as our Venus and Mars City Bike line. If you are interested in ordering custom orders in bulk Email Us!

settings.title: Back To School
settings.text: Need a ride? We have bikes and boards for that

settings.title: Bike
settings.subheader: Explore your sense of adventure without breaking the bank
settings.text: We are committed to bringing you the quality, no compromise biking experience that you desire at a price that makes sense. We are able to do this by working directly with the factory so you can be sure you are getting the best value possible.

settings.quote: "They can take you longer and farther to more unknown places and you don't sacrifice anything on the exercise front unless you want to"
"Who knew they made electric bikes that are actually cute?"
"Retrospec, the brand that makes fun toys like paddle boards, skateboards and bikes, is now adding electric bikes to the mix."

settings.title:
Retrospec x Ride It Baby
Bikes: E-Bike Rebate
Retrospec x Ride It Baby Bikes
settings.text: Between the recent launch of our e-Bike "Rev" collection and the start of summer, we have a lot to celebrate. That's why we've teamed up with Ride It Baby Bikes to bring you something special this season.
settings.text-2: When you rent an e-bike at Ride It Baby Bikes, we will rebate your rental fee with the purchase of an e-bike

settings.title: How it works...
settings.text_1: Rent a Jax Rev e-bike at Ride it Baby Bikes for 1 hour, 2 hours or all day ($40-$80)
settings.text_2: Purchase your own Retrospec Rev e-bike within 30 days of your rental
settings.text_3: Upload your Ride It Baby Bikes rental receipt and input your Retrospec e-Bike order number to the form field below and we will refund your rental fee

settings.title: Electrify your ride
settings.text: Explore farther than ever before

settings.title: E-Bikes
settings.content: Experience the ease of riding an electric bike. Our Rev collection is charged with E-Power and decked out, Retro-style. If you're looking to liven your commute, up your exercise, or cruise for fun, our e-bikes will amplify your biking experience.

settings.quote: "They can take you longer and farther to more unknown places and you don't sacrifice anything on the exercise front unless you want to"
"Who knew they made electric bikes that are actually cute"
"Retrospec, the brand that makes fun toys like paddle boards, skateboards and bikes, is now adding electric bikes to the mix."

settings.shout_out: "Beat the crowds by taking the back roads on Jax Rev."
"New e-bike from @retrospec & I feel like a kid again!"

settings.title: Why should I get an e-bike
settings.checklist:
Lower costs offer an affordable, eco-friendly swap for your car. We don't want to toot our own bike bell, but our e-bikes are some of the most affordable on the market.
Comfort grips, saddle, and upright riding position ensure a comfortable, cloud-9 type of cruise.
Vintage-inspired design that's true to our roots makes your ride the most stylish on the bike path.
Pedal-assist gets you biking farther and faster without breaking a sweat.
Three levels of pedal-assist make your workout customizable to how you're feeling that ride.
Thumb Throttle boosts you up tough incline.

settings.title: Cyber Monday Sale
settings.text: The sale is on. Spread holiday cheer with great gear. Retrospec is your one-stop shop for every adventurer on your list.

settings.title: Gift Adventure
settings.text: Expertly designed, durably crafted, accessibly priced gear to help you spark new traditions outdoors or celebrate timeless ones—there’s no greater gift.
Free shipping
Hassle-free returns

settings.title: Retrospec is excited to introduce our Charter Rental Bike line:
settings.text:

The Charter’s aluminum frame makes for a rental bike that is robust, resilient, and rust-resistant, also packed-full of hand picked and durable components, this bike is designed to rent over and over with very low maintenance. No detail was overlooked in the inception and construction of the Charter... and it shows.   • Pedals: Wellgo Aluminum Chasis with Kraton Rubber
  • Rims: Aluminum Double-Wall with 13G Stainless Steel Spokes, Coated ED Black
  • Hub Rear: KT Coaster Brake Hub
  • Hub Front: KT Hub
  • Axle Nuts: Stainless Steel Acorn
  • Seat Post Clamp: 31.8mm, Black
  • Seatpost: 27.2mm, 300mm
  • Grips: Comfort Ergonomic
  • Kickstand: Rear Mount Bolted to Frame
  • Sign Plate: Welded Large Metal Plate with Removable Decal
  • Recommended Weight Limit: 220 LBS

settings.title: 26" Single Speed
settings.content: The 26" Charter is the bread and butter of your fleet. It's uni-sex step-thru frame fits a wide range of rider heights. Some key features on this models include aluminum frame, sealed precision headset, quick-release seat post clamp, 26"x3" smooth rolling tires, 13g stainless steel spokes, ergo grips etc..

settings.title: Dealer Program and Custom Orders
settings.content:
At Retrospec, we strive to offer you the best product for the best price including price breaks and shipping specials to help you maximize your profits! If you are interested in getting a quote feel free to call us at 213-744-1555 Ext 2 or email one of our account executives at wholesasle@retrospecusa.com

We are also happy to customize your fleet order with branded colors, decals, and accessories for the Charter Rental Bike line as well as others, such as our Venus and Mars City Bike line. If you are interested in ordering custom orders in bulk Email Us!

settings.title: About
settings.description_text: Retrospec has teamed up with Affirm to offer easy financing – without a catch. There are no gimmicks like deferred interest or hidden fees, so the total you see at checkout is always what you actually pay. Provide some basic information and get instant approval to split your purchase into 3, 6, or 12 monthly payments with rates from 10-30% APR. For example A loan of $500 from Affirm would look like this: $43.96/mo. based on a purchase price of $500.00 at 10% APR for 12 months.

settings.description_tab_1:
Does Affirm perform a credit check?

Affirm does a credit check to verify your identity and provide you with a financing offer when you sign up. This is a ‘soft’ credit check and will not impact your credit score. If you choose to complete a purchase and finance it with Affirm, we will do a single ‘hard’ credit check when your first order is processed by the merchant. This may have a minor impact on your credit score. For future purchases with Affirm we won’t need to check your credit again.

 

Why was I prompted to pay a down payment with a credit card?

We try hard to approve every purchase with Affirm but sometimes we can’t approve the full amount. When this happens, we provide a debit card down payment option so that you may still complete your purchase right away.

 

Why was I prompted for a checking account?

Affirm sometimes requires additional information to consider a credit application. Such information may include an active checking account, which helps us verify your identity and your ability to repay the requested loan. If we prompt you for this information but you are unable to provide it, Affirm will be unable to approve your credit application.

 

Can I see an example loan specifying terms of the loan?

Sure! A loan of $500 from Affirm would look like this: $43.96/mo. based on a purchase price of $500.00 at 10% APR for 12 months.

 

Legal Disclosure:

Subject to credit check and approval. Down payment may be required. For purchases under $100, limited payment options are available. Estimated payment amount excludes taxes and shipping fees. Affirm loans are made by Cross River Bank, a New Jersey State Chartered Commercial Bank, Member FDIC. See www.affirm.com/faqs for details.
